sarima_max_prediction.description: Maximum SARIMA prediction (%) before flagging as explosive
sarima_max_prediction.recommendation: Increase if stable >10% growth expected, decrease for stricter validation

component_correlation_min.description: Minimum acceptable correlation between LightGBM and SARIMA components
component_correlation_min.recommendation: Adjust based on regime shifts; lower values indicate diverging predictions

test_train_rmse_ratio.description: Maximum acceptable ratio of test RMSE to train RMSE (overfitting detection)
test_train_rmse_ratio.recommendation: Decrease for stricter overfitting detection, increase if expecting regime shift

ridge_alpha_min.description: Minimum Ridge regression alpha for adequate regularization
ridge_alpha_min.recommendation: Increase for stronger regularization (e.g., 10.0 for production)

forecast_revision_alert.description: Forecast revision threshold (percentage points) to trigger alert
forecast_revision_alert.recommendation: Decrease for more sensitive revision alerts, increase for less frequent alerts

max_missing_percentage.description: Maximum percentage of missing values allowed per feature
max_missing_percentage.recommendation: Decrease for stricter data quality requirements

max_duplicate_dates.description: Maximum number of duplicate dates allowed in dataset
max_duplicate_dates.recommendation: Should always be 0; duplicates indicate data issues

extreme_value_threshold.description: Absolute rent growth value (%) considered extreme
extreme_value_threshold.recommendation: Adjust based on expected market volatility

min_directional_accuracy.description: Minimum directional accuracy (%) for acceptable model performance
min_directional_accuracy.recommendation: May be lower during regime shifts; 50%+ expected in stable periods

max_test_rmse.description: Maximum acceptable test RMSE for model validation
max_test_rmse.recommendation: Adjust based on historical volatility and forecast horizon

min_r2_score.description: Minimum R² score for model validation (negative OK during regime shifts)
min_r2_score.recommendation: Negative R² indicates regime shift; monitor but don't fail validation

min_forecast_periods.description: Minimum number of periods to forecast
min_forecast_periods.recommendation: Should match business requirements (e.g., 12 for 3 years quarterly)

max_forecast_std.description: Maximum standard deviation (%) across forecast periods
max_forecast_std.recommendation: High std indicates unstable forecast; investigate model components

forecast_range_max.description: Maximum range (max - min, %) across forecast periods
forecast_range_max.recommendation: Wide range may indicate growth acceleration/deceleration

alert_aggregation.description: Group similar alerts to reduce email noise

setup: 1. Copy this file to 'validation_thresholds.json' in the same directory
2. Adjust threshold values based on your market expectations
3. Review 'recommendation' field for guidance on each threshold
5. Monitor alert frequency and adjust thresholds as needed

high_growth_market.description: For markets expecting sustained high growth (>10%)

volatile_market.description: For markets with high volatility and regime shifts
